AddConfigBySubscriptionLinkScreen.remarkExist: Примечание уже существует, используй другое имя
AddConfigBySubscriptionLinkScreen.configExist: Профиль уже существует, пожалуйста, не добавляйте его повторно.
AddConfigBySubscriptionLinkScreen.addFailedFormatException: Ошибка при форматировании, пожалуйста, повторите попытку добавления, используя другой тип ссылки на профиль:
AddConfigBySubscriptionLinkScreen.addFailed403: Ошибка при добавлении:$p, Please try to open the Profile Link using the browser that came with the device and import the Profile File downloaded by the browser into this app

ChangeRegionScreen.title: Страна или регион
ChangeRegionScreen.Regions: Совет: Пожалуйста, правильно укажите текущую страну или регион, в противном случае это может вызвать проблемы с производительностью сети.

FileContentViewerScreen.title: Просмотр содержимого файла
FileContentViewerScreen.clearFileContent: Вы уверены, что очистите содержимое файла?
FileContentViewerScreen.clearFileContentTips: Are you sure to clear the content of the Profile file? Clearing the Profile file may cause data loss or abnormal application functions, please operate with caution

HomeScreen.noAvailableServer: Нет доступных серверов. Пожалуйста, добавьте подписку или профиль.
HomeScreen.forwardAllTips: When enabled, all traffic is forwarded through the proxy server

LaunchFailedScreen.invalidProcess: The app failed to start [Invalid process name], please reinstall the app to a separate directory
LaunchFailedScreen.invalidProfile: The app failed to start [Failed to access the profile], please reinstall the app
LaunchFailedScreen.startFromUNC: The installation path is invalid, please reinstall it to a valid path

AddConfigByScanQrcodeScanScreen.title: Сканировать QR-код
AddConfigByScanQrcodeScanScreen.requestCameraPermission: Пожалуйста, разрешите приложению доступ к камере
AddConfigByScanQrcodeScanScreen.requestScreenAccess: Please go to System Settings - Privacy and Security - Screen Recording to add permissions for this application
AddConfigByScanQrcodeScanScreen.scanNoResult: Не удалось проанализировать изображение. Убедитесь, что снимок экрана представляет собой действительный QR-код.
AddConfigByScanQrcodeScanScreen.scanException: Failed to parse the image, please make sure the screenshot is a valid QR code:$p

ServerSelectScreen.testLatencyConnected: Do not disconnect during the test, otherwise the test will be interrupted and a test already in progress may generate wrong results

SubAndConfigScreen.title: Профили
SubAndConfigScreen.canNotRefresh: Not a Profile Link, does not support refresh
SubAndConfigScreen.testLatencyConnected: Do not disconnect during the test, otherwise the test will be interrupted and a test already in progress may generate wrong results
SubAndConfigScreen.confirmDel: Are you sure to delete Profile?
SubAndConfigScreen.atLeastOneEnable: Cannot be disabled, please keep at least one profile enable
SubAndConfigScreen.remarkExist: Remark already exists, please use another name

SettingScreen.title: Настройки
SettingScreen.addConfigByScanQR: Scan Profile Link From QR code
SettingScreen.geoSiteDirectOptimizationTips: When turned on, Apple[apple,apple-ads,apple-dev,apple-pki,apple-update] will use the direct connection mode to obtain a better network experience
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerIntervalTips: [Auto Select]The shorter the time interval, the more timely the server latency data updates, which will occupy more resources and consume more power
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerFavFirstTips: If the [My Favs] list is not empty, Then use the servers in [My Favs]
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerFilterTips: Server latency checks that fail will be filtered out
SettingScreen.proxyAutoSetSystemProxy: Auto Set System Proxy when Connected
SettingScreen.proxyDisconnectWhenQuit: Закрывать соединение при выходе из приложения
SettingScreen.proxyClusterAllowLanConnect: Allow Others to Connect to Cluster
SettingScreen.proxyClusterConfirm: Please confirm that the servers latency have been checked, and proxy services will not be created if they are not checked or checked incorrectly
SettingScreen.tunModeTips: The TUN mode will take over all the traffic of the system [In this mode, you can leave the system proxy unenabled]
SettingScreen.tunModeRunAsAdmin: The TUN mode requires system administrator permissions, please restart the app as an administrator
SettingScreen.quitWhenSwitchSystemUser: Exit App when Switch System Users
SettingScreen.disableUAReportTip: Action data reporting helps us improve the product experience, but closing it is not conducive to rapid optimization and improvement of the product
